title: Help! 3 fonts, '70s-esque
content:
Hey can someone help me id one or several of these 3 typefaces?  
Or lead me to typefaces that are similar to one of these?

Thank You!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| ['70sfonts.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804233132/http:/typophile.com/files/'70sfonts.jpg) | 105.65 KB |
author: ellaytham

comments.content:
CB ACTION appears to be an old Letraset face named Pluto, IIRC.

Super Show 79 is Sinaloa.

Angels, etc. may be Ed Interlock, or may not be...

Angels are an interlock but seems not Ed Benguiat's font as sold by House Industries.

Earlier thread also shows Ed Interlock.  
 [http://typophile.com/node/63093](http://web.archive.org/web/20140804233132/http:/typophile.com/node/63093 "http://typophile.com/node/63093")  
Don

However I find photo-lettering Alphabet Thesaurus reference to Benguiat New Interlock Expanded. Different version? Match?  
Don
